content.summary: Software testing professional with proficiency in Agile methodologies, software testing techniques (unit, integration, functional & automation), and bug tracking tools like JIRA & Mantis Bug Tracker. Strong understanding of SDLC and STLC principles. Achieved a 40% increase in average order value and a 25% boost in user engagement metrics for an academic project using MERN stack.

experience.title: Software Testing Professional
responsibilities: Updating Test Cases and Test Data.
Understanding of configuration management and version control systems.

projects.title: Emotion Based Music Player
projects.objectives: Recognizes the 7 emotions of the user and plays the music accordingly.

projects.title: Team selection and winning Prediction in Cricket using Machine Learning Techniques
projects.objectives: Predict team selection and winning in cricket matches.

projects.title: Interactive Ekart Website
projects.objectives: Enhance user engagement and increase average order value.
projects.contributions: Developed and implemented. Resulted in a 40% increase in average order value and a 25% boost in user engagement metrics.

projects.title: Health Tracking Application
technologies_used: Manual Testing using JIRA Bug Tracking Tool
projects.objectives: Develop a web application for health tracking.
projects.contributions: Developed and tested the application using manual testing with JIRA.

certifications.name: AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
Microsoft Technology Associate - Introduction to programming using python
Coursera - Optimizing a Website for Google Search

candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Developed and implemented several academic projects.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Collaborated with peers, participated in code reviews, supported team objectives.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Able to clearly communicate test cases, findings, and recommendations to technical and non-technical audiences.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Problem-solving, learning agility, adaptability, willingness to learn new skills quickly, ownership, teamwork, flexibility
